about_the_game:
What is Cat City

Cat city is a relaxing, cute and casual game focused on the life stories of the new residents of the city! Be the mayor of a city of cats that arrive according to the progress of the city, help them to settle down, talking to them, helping them in their local businesses, delivering orders from one resident to another and everything that is needed for the good of the city and its residents. By helping them you earn CatCoins, which can be used to furnish their homes, and bring new residents to town.

Encourage local trade

Some cats instead of houses will have a trade, where it will be possible to play a minigame to help you with your tasks in your trade.

Characteristics

  • 10 different residents to meet;
  • 4 trades with a different minigame each;
  • 50 different furniture to unlock;
  • Calm and relaxing music to make your experience better;
  • Cute and low-poly arts;

name: Cat City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Step into the shoes of a mayor of a growing cat town! Talk to your residents, discover their life stories, help them with their daily tasks and complete quests to improve your city.
